titleStmt.title: The faerie qveene disposed into twelue books, fashioning XII. morall vertues.
titleStmt.author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.

notesStmt.note: Dedication on verso of t.-p. signed: Ed. Spenser.
"A Letter of the Authors expounding his whole intention in ... this worke," p. 591-595.
Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through.
First digit of date on t.p. printed under "il" of William; blank spaces on p. 332, lines 4,5, filled in--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
